title: (x) National Credit Union Foundation logo serif face - Cremona {Pieter}
content:
A friend sent this to me to I.D., but I’m stumped:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203190553im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/NCUF2_4893.gif)

Looks familiar to me, a bit like Iridium, Farnham or Mercury, but it’s none of those. (Minus 5 points if you guess Century anything. ;-)

 [‹ (x) Size + Matter modular block sans serif - VMR {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203190553/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38364 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Water System vintage looking serif face - Poor Richard {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203190553/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38367 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Mark Simonson
